name: Helix Crush - Fruit Slices
description:
Stay on music rhythm, swipe the screen to fall through the helix and cut them delicious fruit slices! Keep calm and go as far as possible!

You will surely LOVE:
• Numerous skins (hint: it’s not just fruits)
• Various music genres: upbeat, fun, or relaxing? Your choice!
• Simple one-finger gameplay

Challenge your friends to see who’s the Helix Master!

Got questions/feedback? Email us at pama.support@amanotes.com
